item.title: Following
item.description: Here’s a list of other blogs that I’ve been following for a while or just think are cool. Julia Evans https://jvns.ca/ An Awesome software developer who always seems to be working on something cool. The Musings of an Optimist https://ebzzry.io/eo/ A great blog on lisp and other things that’s also translated into Esperanto including a great explanation of the Y Combinator Steve Klabnik https://words.steveklabnik.com/ Creator the Rust book and more, a great blog on rust and many other things.

item.title: Uses
item.description: Hardware I use I use a Dell XPS 13 Developer Edition running Ubuntu. I use a Dell Ultrasharp 34 monitor. I have two Raspberry Pi’s. I have a pair of Sony MDR7506’s that I’ve been using for about ten years. CODE WASD keyboard. Software I use IntelliJ for Java, Vim, VSCode for almost everything else. I use Spotify for music. I use FireFox for most web browsing, sometimes lynx.

item.title: About
item.description: Adam is a Canadian software engineer from Edmonton Alberta, residing in Austin Texas. Adams hobbies include functional programming, powerlifting, eating copious amounts of greek yogurt, and looking for the perfect breakfast taco.
